bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXVIII (Nos 4639-4704) with contributions by H. AMIRAV, C.F.L. AUSTIN, L. CAPPONI, D. COLOMO, B. CURRIE, K. DOULAMIS, E.W. HANDLEY, A. KERKHECKER, H. MAEHLER, F. MALTOMINI, R. NÜNLIST, J. RADICKE, M. VAN ROSSUM, M. SALEMENOU, C. SCHULER, A. WOUTERS

bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXVIII, 4639-4704. - I. New Literary Texts (4639-4652). - II. Known Literary Texts (4653-4668). - III. Subliterary Texts (4669-4674). - IV. Documentary Texts (4675-4704).
bibl.seg: GONIS N., D. OBBINK and P.J. PARSONS, with contributions by H. AMIRAV, C.F.L. AUSTIN, L. CAPPONI, D. COLOMO, B. CURRIE, K. DOULAMIS, E.W. HANDLEY, A. KERKHECKER, H. MAEHLER, F. MALTOMINI, R. NÜNLIST, J. RADICKE, M. VAN ROSSUM, M. SALEMENOU, C. SCHULER, A. WOUTERS, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXVIII (Nos 4639-4704). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 88.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2003, 8°, xii-184 pp. et XVI pll. coul. ISBN 0-85698-142-7. £65.
P. Oxy. LXVIII, 4639-4704. - I. New Literary Texts (4639-4652). - II. Known Literary Texts (4653-4668). - III. Subliterary Texts (4669-4674). - IV. Documentary Texts (4675-4704).

C.R. par Michael W. Haslam, CR N.S., 56 (2006) pp. 217-218. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 81 (2006) Nos 161-162, pp. 335-341. - George M. Parássoglou, Hellenika 56 (2006) pp. 173-175 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LXIX]. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 79 (2007) pp. 217-220.
Gonis Obbink Parsons Amirav Austin Capponi Colomo Currie Doulamis Handley Kerkhecker Maehler Maltomini Nünlist Radicke van Rossum Salemenou Schuler Wouters
